name: TheNatGeoKidsChallenge
0:
”Alexa, open the Nat Geo Kids Challenge”
”Alexa, start the Nat Geo Kids Challenge”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the nat geo kids challenge
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get weird, get wild, and get wacky with the Nat Geo Kids Challenge! Play one of three fun-filled mini games including: "Name That Animal", "This or That?", or "Weird But True…or False!".

In "Name That Animal", you’ll gain knowledge of common and unique animals as you try to identify creatures based on five fascinating clues. In "Weird But True.. or False!", you’ll sort fact from fiction as you hear questionable facts and decide if they are true or false. And in "This or That?", you might reveal something new about yourself as you take on silly scenarios and choose "This" or "That". 

The Nat Geo Kids Challenge includes two quizzes for "This or That?", five mystery animals in "Name That Animal", and fifteen rounds of "Weird but True …or False!"

*** More rounds, animals, quizzes, and more are available in The Nat Geo Kids Challenge through Amazon Kids+ subscriptions. ***
